DOC.brief_summary: To investigate PK charateristics effect food PK healthy male volunteer receive HIP1402 capsule feed versus fast condition
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Pharmacokinetic Characteristics HIP1402 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , single dose , three-way crossover clinical trial investigate pharmacokinetics incorporate comparison fed/fasted pharmacokinetics HIP1402 healthy male volunteer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer , age 19~50 year 2 . Weight ≥55kg ≤90kg , The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 18 kg/m2 , 27 kg/m2 3 . Subject ability comprehend study objective , content property study drug participate trial 4 . Subject ability willingness participate whole period trial 1 . Presence medical history concurrent disease may interfere treatment safety assessment completion clinical study , include clinically significant disorder kidney , liver , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , endocrine system , neuropsychiatric system . 2 . History relevant drug allergy clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction . 3 . Systolic Blood Pressure : low 100mmHg high 150mmHg , Diastolic Blood Pressure : low 60mmHg high 100mmHg 4 . Liver enzyme ( AST , ALT ) level exceeds maximum normal range one half time . 5 . Subjects take prescription drug within 14 day patient screen nonprescription medicine within 7 day affect result clinical trial ( acceptable accord investigator 's judgement ) 6 . Intake 210g alcohol per week ca n't abstain alcohol trial . 7 . Subjects smoke 10 cigarette per day ca n't quit smoke trial . 8 . Positive screening Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antiHepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antiHuman immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . 9 . Subjects judge ineligible investigator .
